actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the amortization of certain expenditures for safety equipment over a 5-year period.

summary.text: Allows the amortization, under the Internal Revenue Code, of expenditures for safety equipment over a 5-year period. Provides that such deduction shall be in lieu of any depreciation deduction otherwise allowable for such expenditures. Defines the applicable expenditures.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the amortization of certain expenditures for safety equipment over a 5-year period.
